El préstamo otorgado sera invertido, para comprar una computadora que necesita para guardar sus archivos, programas antivirus y otras herramientas que necesita para su trabajo de reparación de computadoras. Ahora con la compra de este equipo, mejora el servicio que le brindara a sus clientes.


El joven planea adquirir un crédito de mayor monto, para montar un taller de reparación de computadoras y un ciber, planea tener una casa, casarse y ser padre de dos hijos.
texts.en:
Herber is 25 years old and single. He has studied to a technical level in computer studies with financial assistance from his mother and from cousins who live in the United States. He currently works in agriculture with his grandfather and sometimes works repairing computers. His family is made up of his mother and grandfather. His mother is a domestic worker and his grandfather works in agriculture. Working together they have been able to get ahead and managed to provide for Herber’s studies.

He has worked in agriculture since he was young, an activity he learned from his grandfather and has some 15 years experience, and also over time he was able to study for a technical career in computers.

He will use this loan to buy a computer that he needs to save his files, antivirus software, and other tools he needs for his computer repair work. Now through the purchase of this equipment, he can improve the service that he offers his customers.

Future plans are to acquire a loan in a larger amount in order to open a computer repair shop and a cybercafe, have a house, get married and have two children.

loans.use: to buy a computer that he needs to save his files, antivirus software, and other tools he needs for his computer repair work

loans.name: Ya- Marie

texts.en:
Meet Ya- Marie.  She is 24 years old and from Waterloo2 eastern area in Freetown. She is married, with one child.  

In 2010, Ya- Marie established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to develop herself. She works at the business from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m., 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the poor network within her operation area.

Ya- Marie requires a loan in order to purchase more palm oil to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her welfare and increase her business. 

In the future, Ya- Marie plans to open a foodstuff table. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María es originaria de la ciudad de Managua y madre de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de Pulpería, el cual le ha permitido tener un negocio prospero. Esta agradecida con Kiva y Micrédito ya que aumento el nivel de productos y mejoro las ventas. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar  artículos y productos como: escoba, jabón, arroz, aceite, pastes, gaseosa entre otros, con el fin de mantener surtida la pulpería. Estima que este crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que crecerá más su negocio y obtener mayor ingresos para hogar.
texts.en:
María is originally from the city of Managua and the mother of one child.  Officially, she is a merchant.  She works at a general store where she has had a prosperous business.  

She is very grateful for Kiva and Micrédito who have helped increase the quality of her products and improved her sales.  

She is requesting a new loan to buy items and articles like: a broom, ham, rice, oil, pastes, snacks, and others in order to keep the store stocked.  She estimates that this credit will help her to continue to grow her business and gain more revenue for her home.

loans.use: to buy items and products like a broom, ham, rice, oil, pastes, snacks, and others

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un joven muy trabajador de 25 años de edad, vive con sus 2 hijos de edades de 1 a 4 años, y su compañera de vida, en la casa de la mamá, donde con su gran esfuerzo, va ayudando a su familia con los gastos del día a día.

Juan tiene 8 años de trabajar en un agro-servicio, donde ejerce su fuerza de trabajo como vendedor de productos agrícolas.
Con el préstamo se está ayudando a Juan, para que pueda pagar la mano de obra, para la recolectar los granos básicos como maíz y frijol, ya que el clima está un poco complicado por las lluvias y no se puede dejar por mucho tiempo sin cosechar.

Juan quiere en un futuro no muy lejano, tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Juan is a very hard-working young man aged 25. He lives in his mother's house with his partner and their 2 children aged 1 and 4. He makes a great effort to help the family cover their daily costs. He has worked for 8 years in a farm supplies merchant wholesalers, where he works hard selling agricultural products.

Juan will use the loan to help pay workers to harvest staple grains such as maize and beans, as the climate is rather difficult because of the rain, and he can't leave his crop long without harvesting. In the near future, Juan would love to own his own home,





Juan quiere en un futuro no muy lejano, tener su casa propia.

loans.use: to pay workers to harvest staple grains such as maize and beans.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
Don José de 72 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos. Él estudio tercer grado, durante 40 años estuvo empleado como soldador general en una hacienda, era el encargado de mantenimiento en el área de estructuras metálicas. Luego se pensiono, compro un pick-up al cual quiere hacerle algunos arreglos y actualmente se dedica a algunas actividades en su casa para subsistir.    


Don José, solicita a Fundación Campo, para comprar unas piezas del guardafango, una villa y otras piezas para arreglar su vehículo. Asi dejara su vehículo en buenas condiciones y evitara que la policía le imponga una multa, por la falta de luces en su carro.   

Don José, realiza algunos viajes en su vehículo, por lo que necesita tenerlo en buenas condiciones, para cuando lo busquen sus clientes, para hacerles un viaje, no dejar de percibir esos ingresos.

Don José, tiene planeado, hacerle algunas mejoras a su casita, ya que poco a poco, la a construido.
texts.en:
Jose, 72 years old, is married and has 4 children. His highest level of education achieved is the 3rd grade. During the last 40 years he was employed as a welder in a farm, where he was in charge of maintenance in the area of metallic structures. After retirement, he bought a truck and he wants to make some improvements to it; he currently performs transportation jobs, working from his home, to cover the necessary expenses.

Jose is requesting a loan through Fundación Campo, to buy a fender and other important car parts to fix his vehicle. Having his truck in proper conditions will avoid that the police might give him a ticket, as he is currently missing tail lights.

Jose works with his vehicle, making transportation trips. This is why he needs to have his truck in good conditions, so that when his customers contact him, he may be able to work for them and not lose possible income. Jose plans to slowly make improvements to his home too, as he has been building it step by step.

loans.use: to buy car parts as a fender, tail lights and other important pieces for his truck.

loans.name: Diana's Group

texts.en:
Diana is 27 years old, a young Iraqi woman. She is married and the mother of three children. 

With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Diana is one of the many Iraqi woman who work from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.

She learned to sew at a young age, and by now she has 10 years of experience with making dresses for women and children and also making small fabric household items based on her customers’ needs. The small income-generating activity based in her home allows her to be flexible with the household duties as well as with the orders received from the clients. 

A major obstacle, however, is that in her area power cuts are frequent and can last for many hours, with no regular patterns or predictability. This makes planning the work difficult, and also leaves her little time for the actual orders to be completed. 

To be able to better plan her work and deliver better quality services, she would like to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine. To be able to afford the purchases she is taking a group loan from Relief International Microfinance Iraq. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of three to five clients, and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.en:
Members of this group requested to remain anonymous on the Kiva website.

One of the female members of the group is 27 years old, a young Iraqi woman. She is married and has been working as a dentist for two years.

After finishing her education she was able to work from her own small business, but the building she is using is in not a very good condition and is very off-putting. To be able to attract more customers and be able to receive greater trust in her services, in the cleanliness of the facility and the quality of the care she can provide, she is taking a group loan from Relief International Microfinance Iraq for the renovation of her work area. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of three to five clients, and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to renovate her dental office

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru:
Зулфия в течение 15 лет занимается торговлей. Она на центральном рынке своего района Хамадони имеет торговую точку, где продает детские одежды. Зулфия замужем, ей 33 года. Ее муж занимается производством окон и дверей. Он очень хороший мастер. У них с мужем имеется сын и дочь, которые учатся в школе. 
Зулфия в данный момент нуждается в кредите. Ей нужно закупить сезонный товар. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. Зулфия собирается приобрести коллекцию зимней детской одежды для развития и оборота торговли.
texts.en:
For the past fifteen years, Zulfiya has been trading at the central market in Hamadoni. She has a stall where she sells children's clothes. Zulfiya is 33 years old and married. Her husband builds doors and windows. He is very skilled. They have a son and daughter who are school-aged. 

Zulfiya needs a loan. She needs to buy seasonal goods. Therefore, she has asked for a loan. Zulfiya is getting ready to buy children's winter clothes to expand her inventory and increase sales.

loans.use: buy children's winter clothes for resale.

loans.name: Jairo

texts.es: Jairo mayor de edad casado con tres hijos menores de edad, originaria del municipio de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país donde predomina el comercio, turismo, Jairo se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal.  es propietario de una pequeña linea de venta de mercadería en general como: adornos, camisas, ropa de cama, cosméticos, productos plásticos, juegos de toallas, pantalones entre otros, sus compras las realiza en otros municipios del país al contado, su jornada diaria empieza desde muy temprano recorriendo los distintos barrios, de los municipios de Chinandega,el tiene clientes fijos y eventuales los cuales da al contado y al crédito recuperando semanal o quincenal, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo y  aprovechar el mes de diciembre que son las fechas que mas se vende por lo que su demanda crece y sus pedidos son mayores, Y de dicha forma en un futuro no muy lejano obtener mejores ingresos económicos y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Jairo agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Jairo is married with three young children. He is originally from the municipality of Chinandega which is located in the western part of the country where commerce and tourism predominates. Jairo is known for being a hard worker, responsible, and for his desire for self improvement. 

He is the owner of a small line of general merchandise such as ornaments, shirts, bedding, cosmetics, plastic products, towel sets, pants, and more. He makes his purchases in other municipalities and pays cash.

His daily work begins very early traveling to various towns of the municipalities of Chinandega. He has both regular and random customers and they pay by cash or by credit which is paid weekly or every other week. 

The objective of this loan is to invest in working capital to take advantage of the month of December which is the time when he sells more because the demand grows and his orders increase.

So this is the way that in the not too distant future he hopes to obtain higher financial profits and meet the demand of his clients. Jairo is grateful for the help of Kiva loaners who help people who have scarce resources.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise to sell including Christmas ornaments, plastic products, various styles of sets of sheets, clothing, and more

loans.name: Segunda Ines

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amigas De Tosagua, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Segunda, tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen diez hijos mayores de edad,  uno de  ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es jubilado, pero actualmente realiza fletes de trasporte en su carro.
Doña Segunda para salir adelante junto a su familia, tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo y su hijo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando ellos están desocupados de sus actividades pero la mayor parte del tiempo ella está en su local ya que le gusta atender a su clientela. Tiene 9 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual salen adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace  años y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los creditos. Su sueño es mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
The Amigas de Tosagua communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua, a place known for being dynamic, where most of the residents are farmers and raise animals. It’s an area of great vegetation.

Segunda lives here.  She is 58 years old, married and has 10 adult children, one of whom still lives with her.  Her husband is retired but still provides transportation services with his car.

Segunda has a food store in her home so that she can get ahead with her family.  There she sells all sorts of products, such as rice, sugar, cooking oils, detergents, beans, vegetables, and fruits.  She works every day from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm and sometimes later.  Her husband and son help her when they are not doing their own work, but mostly she likes to serve customers in her store.  She has been doing this for nine years and it helps them to get ahead.

She will use the money from this loan to stock her store with rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergents, and other primary needs products.  She has been with the credit group for two years and she likes the help they give with loans.  Her dream is to improve her business.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Santisima Trinidad Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento SANTISIMA TRINIDAD, está compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y un varón,  todas ellas se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Lidia, tiene 30 años y tres hijos de 4,6 y 9 años, ella se dedica  a la venta de comida ella vende pescado frito desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a esta actividad, vende  en su puesto de venta que se encuentra  que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Senkata,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Lidia va a usar este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración del pescado como chuño, papa y maíz al por mayor,  la señora Lidia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona hay muchas pensiones que se dedican a la venta de comida, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos para preparar sus riquísimos platillos,  se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
The "SANTISIMA TRINIDAD" communal bank is composed of 8 members, all of which have different activities. The president of the communal bank is Lidia. She is 30 years old and has three children aged 4, 6 and 9. Her business is selling food. She has been selling fried fish for a long time now. She sells from her sales spot which is located in her house in the Senkata neighborhood.

This is her second loan with the Institute. Lidia will use it to bu the supplies to make the fish like chuño (freeze dried potato), potatoes and corn wholesale. The challenges that Lidia faces is competition as there are many small businesses in her area that sell meals. She will use the profits to continue buying ingredients to make her tasty meals. She is pleased and grateful for the opportunity being presented to her.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare  and sell fried fish.

loans.name: Santos Rafael

texts.es:
Santos de 51 años de edad. Su familia esta formada por su compañera de vida, quien se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos, ellos son padres de 4 hijos (dos hembras y dos varones) De los cuales uno de ellos se encuentra en los Estados Unidos y el otros estudiando bachillerato en el instituto  y las dos niñas se encuentran estudiando educación básica en la escuela de la comunidad.
 

la actividad productiva que realizan es la agricultura, desde hace 35 años,  manifiesta que aprendió el trabajo de su padre con quien se creció. Él vende el 40% de sus cosechas de maíz y maicillo. Se dedico a la agricultura motivado por sus padres y su pasión por el trabajo en la tierra ahora lo hace con ayuda de sus hijos y su compañera de vida, ademas de esta actividad productiva, recibe remesas de parte de un hijo que tiene en los Estados Unidos.


El crédito sera invertido, en recoger y dar proceso de preparación a las cosechas de maíz y maicillo para posteriormente almacenarlas, dicha inversión sera distribuida en pago de personas, pago de transporte y pago de maquinas desgranadoras. el crédito le sera de mucha utilidad, ya que se encuentra en la época adecuada de recolección de granos.


Santos desea, terminar de pagar el crédito adquirido y tramitar uno de mayor monto para comprar una maquina desgranadora y así prestar el servicio y obtendrá un ingreso económico mas, que vendrá a suplir otras necesidades ya que también ayudara a su hijo a continuar sus estudios en la Escuela Nacional de Agricultura.
texts.en:
Santos is 51 years old. His family is made up of his life partner, who does housework. They are parents of four children (two girls and two boys). One of the boys lives in the U.S. and the other is studying education at the institute. The two daughters are studying basic education in the community school.

For 35 years, the productive activity he is engaged in has been agriculture. He said that he learned the job from his father, who he grew up with. He sells 40 percent of his corn and sorghum crops. 

His dedication to agriculture is motivated by his parents and his passion for working the earth. Now, he does it with the help of his children and partner. In addition to this work, he receives remittances from his son in the U.S.

The loan will be invested in harvesting and processing corn and sorghum crops for later storage. This investment will be distributed in paying for people, paying for transportation and paying for a shelling machine. The loan will be very useful, as it is at the right time for harvesting crops.

Santos want to pay off the loan and acquire one of higher amount to buy a threshing machine and thus provide the service and get a better income. This will meet other needs and also help his son to continue his studies in the National School of Agriculture.

loans.use: to pay people, transportation and shelling machines to harvest and prepare corn and sorghum crops for later storage.

loans.name: Semon's Group

texts.en:
Semon is a 24-year-old married Iraqi woman. With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Semon is one of the many Iraqi woman who is working from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.
She learned to sew at a young age and by now has 10 years of experience in making dresses for women and children and also making small fabric household items based on her customers’ needs. This small, income-generating activity based in her home allows her to be flexible with the household duties as well as with the orders received from her clients. 

A major obstacle, however, is the fact that power cuts are frequent in her area and can last for many hours, with no regular patterns or predictability. This makes planning her work difficult and also leaves her little time for the orders to be completed. To be able to better plan the work and deliver better quality services, Semon would like to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine. To be able to afford the purchases, she is taking a group loan from Relief International Microfinance Iraq. 

Relief International Microfinance Iraq offers "group loans" for clients who are unable to provide a guarantor and are thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients, and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support of Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine

loans.name: Fatema's Group

texts.en:
Fatema is a 30-year-old Iraqi woman. She is married and a mother of one child. With limited career options due to cultural restrictions and domestic constraints, Fatema is one of the many Iraqi woman who is working from home, using her sewing skills to generate some income and participate in meeting the financial needs of her family.

Fatema learned to sew at a young age and now has 10 years of experience in making dresses for women and children and also making small fabric household items based on her customers’ needs. The small, income-generating activity based in her home allows her to be flexible with the household duties as well as with the orders received from her clients. 

A major obstacle, however, is the fact that her area experiences frequent power cuts that can last for many hours, with no regular patterns or predictability. This makes planning her work difficult and also leaves her little time for the orders to be completed. To be able to better plan the work and deliver better quality services, she would like to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine. To be able to afford the purchases, she is taking a group loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq. 

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "group loans" for clients who are unable to provide a guarantor and are thereby unable to apply for loans as  individuals. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients, and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for her protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support of Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to buy a small generator and a new sewing machine

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en: Rosario is a Peruvian designer who specializes in silver and gemstone jewelry. She would like to invest in a bulk purchase of natural gems and silver. Rosario has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is her story: Rosario launched her career together with her husband. Initially dedicated to clothing, they were encouraged by friends to venture into jewelry. At first, she designed pieces to be crafted. But her husband became so fascinated with the project that he learned the process. Now, each of them creates their own designs. "Inspiration makes me be born again with each new creation, while motivation comes from a desire to succeed," she says. "Thank you all for your support through this microcredit, because it allows me to overcome one of my greatest challenges: that of being a woman and mother who is also an entrepreneur with a great desire to continuously improve. This is the same lesson I hope to impart to my children since they have witnessed how my work has flourished. Each of my designs is inspired by the greatest things the world has to offer: nature and life, history and culture." Use the link below to view Rosario's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/4425

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of natural gems and silver

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is an artist from Mexico who specializes in handcrafted jewelry. She would like to invest in a bulk purchase of silver and gemstones. Olga has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is her story: Olga began designing and crafting silver jewelry in 1970 after studying fine arts and handicrafts. She continued taking courses throughout Mexico while setting up her own workshop, and teaches her art in addition to creating new designs. Since 1972, her jewelry collections have been exhibited in Mexico City, Washington D.C., Venezuela, Canada and Germany, among other countries. Since then, she has come to treasure her unique skills and craft more than ever. "I appreciate your microcredit very much, because it allows me to purchase the materials I need for production. In this way, I am able to continue offering more work to my team of artisans." Use the link below to view Olga's silver jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/288

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of silver and gemstones

loans.name: Argentina

texts.en:
USD 600 is offered to Argentina to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies, such as noodles, oils, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, milk, and biscuits. 

She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Argentina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also be helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy noodles, oils, cigarettes, coffee, sugar, milk, and  biscuits

loans.name: Jerusalem Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento JERUSALEM, está compuesto por ocho integrantes siete mujeres y un  varón,  todas ellas se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Martha, tiene 27 años tiene un hijo de dos años, ella se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir,   vive en la zona de  Corazón de Jesús donde es su taller, este préstamo este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución va a usar este préstamo para la compra de tela al por mayor  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que tienen  pedidos de sus clientes, la señora Martha enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la falta de capital,  y va a utilizar los beneficios en el crecimiento del negocio su deseo  para  su negocio es tener mayores ingresos y apoyar a la familia económicamente y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The Jerusalem bank of entrepreneurship is made of eight members, seven women and one man. All of them are engaged in different activities. 

The president of the bank is Martha, who is 27 years old with a two year old child. She earns her living making clothing. She lives in the Corazón de Jesús zone, where her workshop is. 

This loan is the first cycle in the microfinance institution. She is going to use this loan to buy fabric in bulk. Her reason for asking for this loan is that she has orders from her clients. 

Martha faces a challenge in her business, which is a lack of capital. She will use the benefits for growing her business. Her wish is for her business to have better income and to support her family economically, improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es: Lilia, de 60 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, está casada y tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos ya son mayores e independientes, solo vive con uno de ellos en su casa propia. El trabajo de Lilia consiste en la venta de bebidas gasificadas como gaseosas de distintos sabores y cervezas de distintas marcas, tiene una fuente de soda en su casa en donde lo utiliza para vender sus productos, lleva trabajando con esta actividad ya por cinco años, lo hace con su hijo quien le ayuda en todo lo que puede. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene ingresos y movimiento todos los días, además tiene tiempo para realizar múltiples actividades, le esta yendo bien por el las altas temperaturas que se esta dando en la ciudad, espera poder aumentar la variedad de sus productos y así poder volver a tener los ingresos que tenia antes. En esta oportunidad solicitara  S/.2300 soles, y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mas bebidas gasificadas como gaseosas de distintos sabores y cervezas de distintas marcas para su venta ya que hay algunas promociones que cuando compra en mayor cantidad le dan a menor precio.
texts.en:
Lilia, who is 60 years old, is a happy and hardworking women. She is married and has three children, of whom two are older and independent. She only lives with one of them in her own house.

Lilia's work is selling carbonated beverages, such as sodas of different flavors and different brands of beer. She has a source of soda in her house which she uses to sell her products. She has been working in this business for five years and does it with her son, who helps her in everything he can.

What she likes about her work is that she has income and moves around everyday. She also has time to do different activities, which goes well because of the high temperatures in the city.

She hopes to be able to increase the variety of her products and thus be able to once again have the income she had before. In this opportunity, she is asking for a loan of 2300 soles ($825). She feels very grateful for the financial support she receives to get ahead, and she also promises to pay her shares in a punctual manner. 

With the money asked for, she will buy more carbonated beverages, such as different flavored sodas and different brands of beer to sell, as there are several promotions where one can buy in a higher quantity and receive a lower price.

loans.use: to buy carbonated beverages in bulk.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El de la foto es Juan Carlos, un joven padre de familia de Cochabamba-Bolivia, quien vive en Punata, provincia situada a 45 Km. de Cercado (capital de Cochabamba). Desde pequeño su sueño fue poder enseñar a la gente cosas que puedan mejorar su vida, es por eso que decidió estudiar odontología, para evitar las enfermedades dentales.

Es el menor de cinco hermanos y para que ellos puedan tener un mejor futuro su padre vivió por muchos años en Argentina trabajando como albañil y así poder ahorrar dinero para su familia que se quedó en Bolivia.

Juan Carlos se casó muy joven con quien era su novia desde la época de colegio. Tiene dos hijos de ocho y dos años. Debido a que sus padres ya son mayores, el vive con ellos para cuidarlos y aportar en la economía del hogar.

Aunque le costó muchos sacrificios salir profesional, él pudo terminar la carrera y retornó a trabajar en el hospital de Punata, para poder comenzar a cumplir su sueño de ayudar a la gente, pero sus ingresos apenas le alcanzan para mantener a su familia y a sus padres.

Por eso él solicita un préstamo de crédito educativo, para que pueda acceder a un programa de especialidad en ortodoncia y así poder brindar mejor atención a sus pacientes y finalmente alcanzar su sueño de ayudar a la gente a tener una mejor vida. Del mismo modo, tendrá la oportunidad de generar mayores ingresos para dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
The person in the photo is Juan Carlos, a young father from Cochabamba in Bolivia. He lives in Punata, a province located 45km from Cercado, the capital of Cochabamba. From a small child, his dream was to help teach people things that could improve their life, and this was why he decided to study dentistry, in order to avoid dental illnesses.

He is the youngest of five brothers. Their father lived for many years in Argentina working as a construction worker so he could save money for his family, who stayed behind in Bolivia.

Juan Carlos got married early, to his high-school sweetheart. He has two children aged 8 and 2. As his parents are already getting on in years, he lives with them to look after them and to contribute to the household bills.

Although it cost him many sacrifices to become a professional, he was able to complete his course and return to work in Punata hospital so he could fulfil his dream of helping people. However, his income barely covers the costs of supporting his family and his parents.

For this reason, he is asking for an educational loan, so that he can access a specialist orthodontics programme, thus providing a better service to his patients, and ultimately achieving his dream of helping people have a better life. In the same way, he will have the possibility of earning a bigger income to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to finance his specialisation in orthodontics, dento-facial and maxillo-facial orthopaedics.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Maura de 24 años de edad, tiene un taller de confecciones desde hace 2 años, cuando en el mes de Julio del año 2011, había terminado sus estudios como profesional del diseño de modas y como logró completar su carrera en la universidad,  sintió que sus habilidades, conocimientos empíricos y aptitudes, le daban una gran oportunidad de   poder desarrollarse plenamente y continuar el legado tradicional de su madre, quien durante toda su vida se dedicó a la modistería. En el taller de Maura se confeccionan prendas de vestir para damas e infantil  y son vendidas directamente a su clientela a crédito y de contado. Su día a día laboral, inicia desde las 8 de la mañana y termina hasta las 6 de la tarde, aun cuando en las temporadas de fin de año, se triplica para poder responder a sus solicitudes. A Maura le gusta comprarle a grandes proveedores especializados en telas en la ciudad de Barranquilla, lugar a donde viaja usualmente desde su pueblo ubicado a orillas del mar caribe, sitio de gente alegre y con mucha calidez humana. En la actualidad, sus planes de incrementar su negocio no se detienen, esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará telas, accesorios para darle un acabado especial a sus prendas de vestir,en este fin de año, pues tiene demanda de parte de su clientela, en ropa para damas y niñas. Su meta mas adelante es comprar su propio apartamento y ella siente que necesita producir para ahorrar cada día más y lograr su sueño de prosperidad, por encima de sus grandes desafíos productivos.
texts.en:
Maura is 24 years old. She has had a sewing workshop for the past two years. In July 2011 she finished her studies in Fashion Design at university. She felt that her abilities, practical experience and aptitude offered her a great opportunity to develop herself and to continue the tradition inherited from her mother, who during her whole life was a dress maker.

Maura's workshop makes clothing for women and children and are sold directly to her clients in cash or on credit. Her work day starts at 8 am and she works until 6 pm although towards the end of the year she works much longer in order to fulfill the demand.

Maura likes to buy from the large wholesalers specializing in cloth in the city of Barranquilla, a place she normally visits from her community situated on the shores of the Caribbean Ocean. It is a place of happy people and lots of human warmth.

At present her plans to continue the expansion of her business go on and this is the reason she is requesting a loan from Kiva. This is her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy cloth and accessories to give a special finish to her clothing. At this year end she has a lot of demand in woman's and children's clothing.

Her goal in the future is to buy her own apartment and she feels she has to be more productive every day in order to save and achieve her goal of becoming prosperous, despite the challenges of her business.

loans.use: to buy cloth and accessories in large volume.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
Marciana is 27 years old and she is applying for a loan of 1000 USD to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2000 with her own working capital of 70.  She earns a good income from her business.

She will use her loan to buy some stock to keep in her store, such as petrol and diesel. She is a very hardworking woman and doing business has become her regular activity for the past 13 years. She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy petrol and diesel.

loans.name: Monica Yaqueline

texts.es:
Monica Miraval, tiene 23 años actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad en la Universidad Las Américas, su carrera consta de 5 años y se encuentra en el penúltimo año. 
Ella trabaja de Asistente Contable en una empresa llamada Renaware realiza sus prácticas pre-profesionales, dedica 30 horas semanales para sus estudios y se siente muy satisfecha y a la vez muy entusiasmada de poder estar logrando uno de sus más deseados sueños de convertirse en una contadora.
Su anhelo más grande es poder terminar su carrera satisfactoriamente por eso que le pone muchas ganas para así superar cualquier obstáculo que se le presente, el préstamo solicitado será utilizado para el pago completo del octavo ciclo de su carrera y así ella pueda sentirse tranquila y a la vez desenvolverse de manera práctica.
Su meta a un futuro es poder culminar sus estudios y trabajar en una empresa reconocida y también le gustaría poner su propio estudio contable.
A la vez nos da su aporte de agradecimiento ya que se siente agradecida por el préstamo que se le brindó y anima que sigan apoyando a las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Monica Miraval is 23 years old. She is presently studying Accounting at the Universidad Las Américas. It is a five year course and she is in her fourth year.

She works as an assistant accountant in a company called Renaware for her practicum. She dedicates 30 hours a week to her studies and feels very satisfied and at the same time enthusiastic at being able to achieve one of her greatest dreams, which is to become an accountant.

Her greatest wish is to be able to finish her studies and in order to do this she puts in a lot of effort to overcome all obstacles. The loan she has requested will be used to pay for the 8th semester of her studies. Then she can feel calm and progress in a practical manner.

Her future goal is to complete her studies and to work in a well-known company. She would also like to open her own Accounting practice. She would like to express her gratitude for the loan that is being given her and at the same time gratitude for the continued support to the people who most need it.

loans.use: to pay for her studies.

loans.name: Shafoat

texts.ru: Шафоат 39 лет. Она проживает с мужем, сыном и дочерью в городе Худжанде, в северной столице Таджикистана. Муж Шафоат работает мастером плотником. Дочь уже год как закончила школу, а сын еще учится в школе. Сама Шафоат  до сегодняшнего дня работала на рынке уборщицей. Теперь она намерена открыть собственный бизнес. Она давно мечтала открыть свадебный салон и заняться прокатом свадебных платьев. Сейчас она думает настал момент. Шафоат уже взяла в аренду помещение, а также у нее осталось еще сбережение в размере 600 долларов. Шафоат просит кредит и хочет закупить 5-6 штук свадебных платьев и прочие аксессуары. Она планирует заниматься этим бизнесом вместе с дочерью и уже верит в успешность своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Shafoat is 39 years old. She lives with her husband, son, and daughter in Khujand in the northern capital of Tajikistan. Shafoat's husband works as a master carpenter. Her daughter graduated from high school a year ago, and her son is still in school. Until now, Shafoat has worked as a janitor in the market. Now she intends to start her own business. She has long dreamed of opening a bridal salon and renting wedding dresses. Now she thinks the time has come. Shafoat has already leased the space, and she still has $600 in savings. Shafoat is asking for a loan to buy five or six wedding dresses and other accessories. She plans to run the business with her daughter, and she believes in the success of the business.

loans.use: buy wedding dresses and accessories so she can rent them out.

loans.name: In'omjon

texts.ru: Инъомчон молодой 26-летний житель района Спитамен. У него высшее финансовое образование. Инъомчон работает кассиром в местном банке. Одновременно он в течение 8 лет занимается животноводством. Инъомчон при дворе дома разводит крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Он успевает во всем, ведь ему помогает жена. Его жена тоже работает, она воспитательница в детском саде. У Инъомчона с женой имеется двухлетняя дочь и четырехлетний сын. Они очень любят своих детей и стараются работать усердно ради их блага. Сейчас в их скотном дворе осталось два бычка. Инъомчон хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить бизнес. С такой целью он обратился за кредитом. Он просит в кредит 3000 долларов США и собирается купить трех голов быков хорошей породы и корм для скота. Инъомчон планирует продавать каждый месяц по одному быку.
texts.en: In'omjon is a young, 26-year-old resident of Spitamen. He has a higher education in finance. In'omjon works as a cashier at a local bank . At the same time, he has spent eight years working in animal husbandry. In'omjon breeds cattle in the barnyard in front of his house. He manages to do everything because his wife helps him. His wife also works; she is a kindergarten teacher. In'omjon and his wife have a two-year-old daughter and a four-year-old son. They love their children and try to work hard for their benefit. Now they only have two bulls left in the barnyard. In'omjon wants to increase his livestock and expand the business. To that end he applied for a loan. He is asking for a loan of $3,000 to buy three calves of good breeding and cattle feed. In'omjon plans to sell one bull every month.

loans.use: buy three calves of good breeding and cattle feed.

loans.name: Guldasta

texts.ru: Эту 46-летнюю женщину зовут Гулдаста. Она проживает в районе Хамадони. Гулдаста мать четверых детей. Все ее дети кроме старшего сына ходят в школу. Ее муж в данный момент находится в России на заработках. Сама Гулдаста занимается малым торговым бизнесом. Она на рынке района имеет маленькую торговую точку и продает там детские игрушки и хозяйственные принадлежности. Гулдаста занята в сфере торговли более 14 лет. Сейчас ей помогает старший сын. Гулдаста хочет увеличить количество клиентов и продаж. С этой целью она запрашивает кредит, чтобы закупить новый ассортимент хозяйственных принадлежностей. Она очень нуждается в этом кредите.
texts.en: This woman's name is Guldasta and she is 46 years old.  She lives in the Hamadoni region.  Guldasta is a mother of four children.  All of her children except for her eldest son attend school.  Her husband is currently located in Russia as a migrant worker.  Guldasta has a small retail business.  In her region's local market she has a small trading stall where she sells children's toys and household goods.  Guldasta has been engaged in the retail business for more than 14 years and now her eldest son helps her.  She wants to increase her quantity of clients and goods.  With this goal in mind, she is asking for a loan to buy a new assortment of household goods.  She is in great need of this loan.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of household items

loans.name: Bertha Maria

texts.es: Bertha es originaria de la ciudad de Chinandega, casada y madre de 3 hijos. De 33 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de especias. Inicio este negocio como una herencia de su mamá y su papa, quienes la inculcaron  valores y principios. Ella es una persona luchadora, quien a la fecha ha logrado mantener un negocio estable. Solicita el crédito para comprar: algodón, achiote, clavo de olor, canela entre otros, con el fin de ofrecer una mayor cantidad de sus productos. Estima que este crédito le ayudara a crecer su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida. Su plan futuro es comprar un carro de segunda mano para poder ofrecer sus productos en las zonas cercanas de Chinandega.
texts.en:
Bertha, 33, is originally from the city of Chinandega. She is married and had three children. She is a vendor who sells spices. She started this business as an inheritance from her parents, who instilled her with values and principles. She is a hard-working person who, to this day, has been able to maintain a stable business.

She is requesting this loan to buy cotton, achiote, cloves, cinnamon, and other products so she can offer a greater variety of products. She believes this loan will help her to grow her business and improve her quality of life. Her plan for the future is to buy a used car so she can sell her products in the areas around Chinandega.

loans.use: to buy cotton, achiote, cloves, cinnamon, and more.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
This is Jimmy, 60, a resident of Tondo, Manila, Philippines. He is married to Josephine, a vendor, and they have children. Together with his wife, he manages their household while operating his business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.
Jimmy is a dental technologist. He makes dentures, dental bridges, removable partial dentures and other dental appliances. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community.  He earns a minimum of 600 PHP in his business every day.

To help him continue the operation of his business, he is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP. He will use the loan to buy materials such as upper and lower porcelain, acrylic powder and liquid and other materials needed in his business.

Jimmy dreams that his business will continue to exist and expand. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for materials such as upper and lower porcelain, acrylic powder and liquid and other materials needed in his business.

loans.name: Buzeinep

texts.ru: Бузейнеп 51 год, из-за сложного характера супруга развелась с мужем и одна воспитала 3 детей. В воспитании детей супруг участия не принимал и материальной помощи от него не было. Пережив развод с мужем и выйдя из депрессии, Бузейнеп взяла себя в руки и дала себе слово, что она одна сможет поставить своих детей на ноги и дать им все необходимое в жизни. У Бузейнеп - высшее образование она работает в районной больнице фельдшером, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Бузейнеп занимается животноводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 15,000 сом KGS. И у нее это неплохо получается, благодаря упорному труду и настойчивому характеру Бузейнеп, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бузейнеп обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Бузейнеп планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Buzeinep is 51 years old. Because of her husband's difficult personality, she divorced him and raised their three children alone. Her husband did not have anything to do with parenting the children, nor did he pay any support. After divorcing her husband and getting through depression, Buzeinep pulled herself together and vowed that she will be able to get on her feet and give her children everything they need in life. Buzeinep has a higher education. She works as a medical assistant in the district hospital, and to make additional income, Buzeinep works with livestock. She started thirteen years ago by buying 15,000 KGS worth of livestock. She is doing well, thanks to her hard work and persistent nature. Buzeinep's farm today boasts three milk cows and five sheep. Her monthly income is 15,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, she approached the microfinance bank Bai - Tushum and Partners for a loan to buy sheep for fattening and resale. Buzeinep plans to use profits from the loan to increase her domestic animals and save enough money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Мавчуда из Истаравшана около 15 лет работает в сфере земледелия и животноводства. Она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Мавчуда нуждается в кредите, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения и несколько голов скота. Она параллельно занимается земледелием и скотоводством. Совместить эти 2 деятельности и успевать в обоих случаях Мавчуде удается отлично. Потому что такими длительностями она занимается с юных лет. Благодаря кредиту Мавчуда сможет посадить зимний урожай и увеличить поголовья скота. Вы можете помочь ей!
texts.en: Mavjuda from Istaravshan has about 15 years of experience in agriculture and animal husbandry. She grows crops. Mavjuda needs a loan to buy fertilizer and a few head of cattle. She works both in agriculture and animal husbandry. Combining these two activities works out perfectly for Mavjuda, and she is succeeding at both. She has been doing this work from a young age. Thanks to this loan, Mavjuda can sew the winter harvest and increase her livestock. You can help her!

loans.use: buy fertilizer and a couple head of cattle.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru:
Рустам молодой отец двоих детей. Он с женой и детьми живет у родителей. Жена Рустама преподаватель. Пока Рустам и его жена на работе, за их детьми присматривают родители Рустама. Сам Рустам занимается земледелием. Ему 25 лет. Около трех лет он занимается такой деятельностью. Такая работа сложная, но Рустам привык к такому режиму работы. Землю, которую Вы видите на фотографии, это всего лишь часть земли, которую Рустам на данный момент вскапывает вручную. 
  Сейчас Рустам готовится к посеву. Он берет кредит, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Он собирается обработать землю и подготовить участок земли к посеву. Рустам надеется, его обязательно поддержат и помогут. Рустам ждет Вашей помощи.
texts.en: Rustam is a young father of two children.  He and his wife and children live with his parents.  His wife is a teacher.  While Rustam and his wife are at work, his parents look after the children.  Rustam is an agricultural worker.  He is 25 years old and he took up this work about three years ago.  That kind of work is difficult, but Rustam is used to it.  The land that you see in the photographs is just part of the land that Rustam currently works with his own hands.  He is now preparing to sow and he is asking for a loan to purchase mineral fertilizer.  He plans to work the land and prepare a plot for sowing.  Rustam hopes that he will receive help and support.  He is awaitng your help.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and tilling tools

loans.name: Katherina Jaoska

texts.es: Katherine Jaoska 20 años de edad casada con una hija menor de edad aun bajo su responsabilidad originaria del municipio de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, es propietaria de una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitación donde ofrece productos de consumo del hogar como: granos básicos, golosinas, sal, huevos, medicamentos, detergentes, productos congelados, entre otros, al igual que se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como: cosméticos, chineria, variedades estilos de ropa, entre otros, su jornada diaria inicia desde muy temprano y así les brinda un buen servicio a sus clientes los cuales son fijos y algunos eventuales, uno de sus sueños es poder ver crecer aun mas su negocio y ver convertido profesionalmente a su pequeña hija. el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de granos básicos, productos congelados,  al igual que mercadería en general como:variedades estilos de ropa interior, de ropa de niños, chinerias, shampoo, cosméticos entre otros. Katherine agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos y países pobres como es Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Katherine Jaoska, age 20, is married and has a minor daughter in her care.  She is from the Chinandega municipality, which is located in the western part of the country.  She has a grocery store in her house.  She offers products that are consumed at home like basic grains, candy, salt, eggs, medication, detergent, and frozen products, among others.  She also buys and sells general merchandise like cosmetics, knickknacks, and various styles of clothing, among others.

Her daily workday starts very early.  This way she provides her customers with good service.  She has both regular and occasional customers.  One of her dreams is to be able to see her business grow even more and to see her little daughter become a professional.

The reason for this loan is to buy basic grains and frozen products.  She will also buy general merchandise like various styles of underwear, children’s clothing, knickknacks, shampoo, and cosmetics, among others.

Katherine is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders offer to people with scarce financial resources in poor countries like Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like clothes and products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Lita

texts.es: Lita, de 49 años, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de los cuales tres son mayores e independientes, y solo tiene un niño viviendo con ella que tiene 7 años, tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su último hijo. El trabajo de Lita consiste en la compra al por mayor de bebidas gasificadas como cervezas y gaseosas, para después los vende al menudeo y gana su porcentaje por el plus que le da al ponerlos a helar, realiza este trabajo ya por cinco años, tiene una fuente de soda pequeña en su casa y trabaja sola ya que es el principal fuente de ingresos en su hogar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para hacer algunas cosas mas a parte trabajar en esto, le va bien ya que tiene clientes en su cuadra que sabes que sus bebidas siempre están heladas y buscan primero en su negocio, espera poder mantenerse así ya que le esta yendo bien y mas adelante quizás agrandarlo. En esta oportunidad solicitara 1500 soles, y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado, comprará bebidas como cervezas y gaseosas al por mayor para poder tener mayor variedad que ofrecer a sus fieles clientes.
texts.en:
Lita, age 49, is a single mother with four children.  Three of the children are grown and independent.  She only has one child, age seven, living with her.  She has her own house in which she lives with her last child.

Lita’s work consists of buying carbonated drinks like beer and soft drinks wholesale.  She later sells them at retail and earns her percentage plus what she is given for chilling them.  She has been doing this work for five years.  She has a small soda fountain in her house.  She works alone, and she is the only source of income in her household.

What she likes about her work is that it gives her time to do other things besides working in her business.  It is going well for her.  She has customers in her neighborhood who know that her drinks are always cold, and they go to her business first.  She hopes to be able to continue this way because it is going well for her.  Later, she will perhaps expand the business.

This time she is requesting 1,500 soles.  She is grateful for the financial support that she is receiving in order to get ahead.  She pledges to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested loan to buy drinks like beer and soft drinks wholesale in order to be able to have a greater variety to offer her loyal customers.

loans.use: to buy drinks like beer and soft drinks wholesale.

loans.name: Munhsuh

texts.en:
Mrs. Munhsuh is a 49-year-old single mother and lives with her younger three daughters in their Ger (traditional nomadic yurt) in Uvs province, Mongolia. Her older children have gotten married and live apart. Her oldest of three daughters works at a local company to support her family and younger sisters' university tuition fees. The two younger daughters are university students. Her daughter Suvd is going to study in Russia this year, and they are very glad that she is able to get higher education abroad.

Munhsuh has been renting a cafeteria in a good location since 2010. She used to work as chef at small cafes in town for years. She has experience and skills to run her business. She supports her children to grow and be educated. She is now requesting loan of 3,500,000 MNT to pay for her second daughter's university tuition in Russia. She has high hopes for her daughters.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university tuition in Russia.

loans.name: Togtuur

texts.en:
Togtuur is 29 years old and lives with her husband in their ger (traditional nomadic yurt) in Uvs province, Mongolia. Her husband helps her to run their family business of traditional food delivery. 

Togtuur used to work at a local small cafeteria. She rented the small cafeteria and started her own cafeteria business in 2005. But the profit margin was very small due to the renting fee. She decided to cook food at home and deliver to local market retailers and other businesses. Her husband helps her to deliver food and purchase the materials. Togtuur is also planning to open a mobile clothes retail business soon. 

Togtuur is now requesting a loan of 2,800,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of meat and other food materials to run her traditional food delivery business.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of meat and other food materials to run her traditional food delivery business.

loans.name: Fredjelyn

texts.en:
Fredjelyn is married and lives in Taboc Norte, Oroquieta City. Her source of income is rice retailing. She is able to support her family through this business. Every month she earns an approximate income of 8,000 PHP and she wants to expand her business through additional inventories of rice. She has approached PMPC for the financial help.

In the future, Fredjelyn wants to save for her retirement and wants to live in a decent home.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice.

loans.name: Tseren

texts.en:
Tseren is 49 years old and lives with her husband in their small house in Uvs province, Mongolia. Her husband Tsogtoo is college professor. Her children are married and live apart.

Tseren started her small food retail booth in their plot of land in 1999. She was one of the starters of that business. Her booth is close to the local public school and other crowds and sales are good. She is a well-experienced, kind, and talkative woman who is now requesting loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase food and other inventories to sell at her food retail booth.

loans.use: to purchase food and other inventories to sell at her food retail booth.

loans.name: Seferita

texts.es: Seferita es originaria de la ciudad de Chinandega, de 37 años de edad.  Casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa. Inicio su vida de comerciante con su mamá, quien vendía verduras. A sus 19 años decide independizarse de su mamá y poner su propio negocio, con la ayuda de su esposo, inicio un pequeño negocio de forma  ambulante vendiendo de ropa. Con el paso del tiempo logro comprar un pequeño tramo para vender sus productos.  Solicita un crédito para comprar: ropas de niños, ropa para adultos al por mayor, con el fin de extender su mercadería y ofertarla. Estima que este crédito le ayudara a aumentar la demanda de clientes y obtener mejores ganancias. Sus planes  futuros es solicitar un financiamiento para la compra de vitrinas mesas y estantes para el fortalecimiento de su negocio y lograr  tener una mejor estabilidad de vida.
texts.en:
Seferita comes from Chinandega city and is 37 years old. She is married and the mother of two children. She is a clothes seller by trade. She started her life in commerce with her mother, who sold vegetables. At the age of 19 she decided to set up her own business independently. With the help of her husband, she started a small travelling business selling clothes. After some time, she managed to buy a small plot to sell her products.

Seferita is asking for a loan to buy wholesale clothes for children and adults, with the aim of extending and offering more merchandise. She feels that this loan will help her to increase demand from customers and to obtain a bigger profit. Her future plans consist of asking for finance to buy a shop window, tables and shelves to strengthen her business and to achieve a more stable life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothes for children and adults.

loans.name: Toktobubu

texts.ru: Токтобубу 57 лет, замужем, многодетная мать, вместе с супругом воспитывают 7 детей. Токтобубу считает себя очень счастливым человеком, благодаря своим семерым детям. Все дети выросли умными и послушными. Половина из них женаты и проживают отдельно. Остальные помогают Токтобубу по хозяйству. Вся семья трудолюбивая, а любовь к труду своим детям привила Токтобубу еще в детстве. Супруг Токтобубу фермер. У Токтобубу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Токтобубу занимается животноводством, стартовав 26 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Токтобубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 10 лошадей,23 овцы. В доме у Токтобубу имеются все условия для содержания скота. Под чутким руководством Токтобубу заготовлены корма на зиму около 1,000 тюков сена. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Токтобубу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом -на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Токтобубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку семейного автомобиля. Мечта Токтобубу съездить всей семьей на своей семейной машине на море. И они всей семьей идут к этой цели.
texts.en: Toktobubu is 57 years old, married, and the mother of many children. She and her husband are raising seven children. Toktobubu is a very happy person because of her seven children. All of the children grew up to be clever and obedient. Half of them are married and live on their own. The others help Toktobubu on the farm. The whole family is hardworking, and Toktobubu instilled a love of hard work in them during childhood. Toktobubu's husband is a farmer. Toktobubu has a secondary education. The family's primary source of income is animal husbandry. Toktobubu started this business 26 years ago when she bought 1,000 KGS worth of livestock. Through Toktobubu's hard work, her farm now boasts three dairy cows, ten horses, and 23 sheep. Toktobubu has everything needed for keeping livestock at home. With Toktobubu's guidance, they have procured about 1,000 bales of hay for the winter. Her monthly income is 17,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, Toktobubu  approached the microfinance bank Bai - Tushum and Partners for a loan to buy a cow for breeding. She plans to use profits she makes from the loan to invest in further increasing her domestic animals, and she plans to save enough money to purchase a family car. Toktobubu's dream is to take the whole family to the sea in their family car. She has the whole family working toward this.

loans.use: buy a cow

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
Sol Naciente está en su sexto ciclo del programa de comités, donde la  Sra. Elisa es una de las miembros, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo se encuentra mejorando su economía y la de su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la costura, con lo cual lucha incansablemente para poder dar a su familia lo que necesitan.
Elisa es una persona que quiere crecer y salir adelante, es por eso que está luchando por mejorar su vida y la de su familia, participando de las capacitaciones y poniendo su mayor predisposición por aprender.
Pide de este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. También agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group ‘Sol Naciente’ (meaning 'Rising Sun') is currently in its 6th cycle with the committee’s program, and Elisa is one of the members who has been working arduously and improving her family’s economy.

Sewing is one of the jobs that she performs, tirelessly providing for her family. Elisa is a person who wishes to grow and get ahead in life, and this is why she works to improve her livelihood and that of her family. She participates in capacity building workshops, and dedicates her best efforts to learn.

She is asking for a loan to invest in buying threads and fabrics, which will help her to follow her business plan, and in this way, increase her income. Elisa is thankful for this opportunity that she is being granted.

loans.use: to buy threads and fabrics for sewing.

loans.name: Josue Isaias

texts.es:
Josué es un Joven Estilista Emprendedor, vive en su casa de habitación en una comunidad al oriente de Honduras y su negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación.
Josué tiene varios años de dedicarse a esa actividad y está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de nuevas tijeras, cremas de afeitar, toallas, etc. y  brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, espera que esta inversión le permita obtener las ganancias suficientes para seguir apoyando a su familia y con los gastos en el hogar.
Josué su sueño es formar una empresa y generar empleo.  .

  
Trojes, Honduras- Octubre del 2013.
texts.en:
Josué is a young, enterprising stylist.  He lives in his house in a community in the eastern part of Honduras.  His business is located in his house.  Josué has been engaged in this business activity for several years.

He is requesting the loan to buy new scissors, shaving cream, and towels, etc.  He will do this in order to provide his customers with better service.  He hopes that this investment will allow him to get sufficient earnings to continue supporting his family and to pay for the household expenses.

Josué’s dream is to form a company and to generate employment.

Trojes, Honduras  October, 2013

loans.use: to buy new scissors, shaving cream, and towels, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Tungalag

texts.en:
Tungalag is a 40-year-old single mother who lives with her 3-year-old daughter in a ger (traditional nomadic yurt) in Uvs province, Mongolia. Her daughter Suvd goes to a local kindergarten. 

Tungalag has been providing tailoring services in town since 2005. She used to run a small clothes retail booth at a local market. Since she needed to take care of her only daughter from her late birth, she decided to run her business at home that is located closer to a maternity hospital. She decided to produce maternity and baby clothes at home and sell to newborn babies and mothers. 

Tungalag is now requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase inventories to produce maternity and baby clothing to sell at home. She is a hardworking, responsible, and trustworthy woman.

loans.use: to purchase inventories to produce maternity and baby clothing to sell at home.

loans.name: Vohid

texts.ru: Вохид жизнерадостный человек. Он родился в 1964 года. Вохид женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Вохид более 20 лет занимается скотоводством. Вохид покупает скот, откармливает 6 месяцев и потом продает на местном рынке по более высокой цене. Его жена помогает ему введению бизнеса. Она не имеет своего бизнеса. Вохид единственный кормилицей 4 детей. Он должен увеличить оборотный капитал. Вохид запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 долларов США для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Vohid is a cheerful person. He was born in 1964. Vohid is married and has four children. Vohid has been breeding livestock for more than twenty years. Vohid buys cattle, fattens it for six months, and then sells it at the local market for a higher price. His wife helps him run the business. She does not have her own business. Vohid is the sole breadwinner for the four children. He must increase his sales. Vohid is requesting a loan of $2,500 to buy cattle. He's awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Gulchera

texts.ru:
Гульчехра мама пятерых детей и верная жена. Гульчехре 46 лет. Ее дети живут с ней. Три младшей дочери учатся в школе. Старший сын Гульчехри женат. Он с женой и двумя детьми живет в родительском доме. Для Гульчехри ее внуки настоящая радость. Она всегда найдет время для них.
   Гульчера занимается растениеводством. Она выращивает пшеницу. Для нее это прибыльная работа и не скучно проводимое время. Гульчехра работает вместе с сестрой. Сейчас они собираются посадить пшеницу. Чтобы реализовать посев Гульчера просит кредит. Она намерена на деньги от кредита купить минеральные удобрения, горючей смеси для трактора и пшеницу. Гульчера надеется, что ее поддержат. Она надеется на Вас!
texts.en:
Gulchera is the mother of five children and a faithful wife. Gulchera is 46 years old. Her children live with her. The three youngest daughters are still in school. Gulchera's eldest son is married. He and his wife and two children live in the family home. Gulchera's grandchildren are a real joy. She always has time for them.

Gulchera works in agriculture. She grows wheat. For her, this is a lucrative job that she doesn't get bored doing. Gulchera works with her sister. Now they are going to plant wheat. Gulchera is asking for a loan to put in her crop. She intends to use the loan money to buy fertilizer, tractor fuel, and wheat. Gulchera hopes you will support her. She is counting on you!

loans.use: buy wheat, fertilizer, and tractor fuel.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma helps her husband operate their own fishing business, raising fish, crabs, and shrimp in their fishpond. She has been working in it for more than fifteen years, and she earns well for the family. The couple were determined enough to gain profit and were able to repay her previous loan successfully.

Recently, she borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy fingerlings and feeds. She is hopeful to improve her business, and with sustained effort and perseverance, be able to improve the general living situation of the entire family in the future.

loans.use: to buy fingerlings and feeds.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth helps her husband operating their own farm to earn a living. For fourteen years of growing and harvesting corn, the couple earns enough that they are able to provide the family. Her previous loan used for the farm was successfully repaid. Recently, Elizabeth requested a new loan to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer. In the future, Elizabeth wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new variety of seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Wilber Ernesto

texts.es:
Wilber de 25 años de edad,  estudio hasta noveno grado de educación, está acompañado su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar,  tiene en común 1 hijo de 2 años de edad.  

Él se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de maíz frijol, maicillo; realiza esta actividad desde que era muy pequeño su padre de él, le enseño a cultivar. Decidió dedicarse a esta actividad, porque no encontró otra forma de ayudar a su familia, además de la agricultura, realiza otra actividad económica y es la de motorista. No tiene carro propio, pero cuando lo buscan para realizar viajes, también hace esta actividad para generar un poco más de ingresos al hogar. Para  llegar a donde cultiva, viaja 3 kilómetros y lo hace en bicicleta, en otras ocasiones caminando y cuando es necesario lo hace en carreta halada con bueyes. Su horario de trabajo es 7 horas al día.  


Wilber invertirá una parte del crédito, para comprar dos bueyes, para hacer transladar el producto agrícola hasta la casa y otra pequeña lo invertirá en el mejoramiento de su casa, cambiara puertas y pondrá cemento al suelo dentro de su casa.  Para asegurar que sus familia este en mejores condiciones. 
   
Sus sueños, es encontrar un  trabajo estable que  pueda darle la oportunidad de sostener de mejor manera a su familia y darles una vida digna,  el préstamo le ayuda a tener una herramienta de trabajo. Pretende seguir trabajando y luchando fuerte  para superarse y que su familia viva mejor, ampliando su negocio, sembrando más producto agrícola como hortalizas,  frutales, etc.
texts.en:
Wilber, 25 years old, has a ninth grade level education. He is in a common-law marriage and his partner is a homemaker. They have one two-year-old son in common.

Wilber works in agriculture, planting corn, beans and sorghum. He has been doing this work since he was very young. His father taught him to farm. He decided to do this kind of work because he couldn't find another way to help his family. In addition to agriculture, he also works as a driver. He does not have his own car, but when sought out to do trips he has done this type of work to generate a little more household income. To get to where he grows, he travels 3 kilometers by bicycle, occasionally on foot, or when necessary in an ox-drawn wagon. His work schedule is seven hours per day.

Wilber will invest a portion of the loan in the purchase of two oxen to transfer agricultural product to the house. A smaller portion he will invest in home improvement. He will swap out doors and pour a cement floor inside his house to ensure that his family is in the best conditions.
   
His dream is to find a steady job that allows him the opportunity to better support his family and give them a decent life. The loan will help him have a work tool. He hopes to continue working hard and fighting to excel, expanding his business and planting more crops, such as vegetables and fruits, etc. and to see his family living better.

loans.use: to buy two oxen to transfer agricultural product to the house. A small portion he will invest in home improvement; he will change doors and pour a cement floor inside his house.

loans.name: Cresenciana

texts.en:
Cresenciana is 58 years old and married with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Cresenciana has a buy and sell ready to wear (clothing off the rack) business in the Philippines. Cresenciana requested a PHP 20,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of ready to wear to sell.

Cresenciana has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Cresenciana would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional clothing to sell

loans.name: Marta

texts.en:
A 1,000 USD loan is offered to Marta to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2004 with her own working. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store, such as beer, milk, biscuits, Fanta, coca cola, sprite, cigarettes, fish, water, oils, and noodles. She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking about running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy beer, milk, biscuits, Fanta soft drink, coca cola, sprite, cigarettes, fish, water, oils, and noodles.

loans.name: Norbertina

texts.en: Norbertina is applying for a loan of $1.000 to improve her business. She is running a business in her house selling children's school clothes, schoolboy pants, long-sleeved clothing, short-sleeved clothing, long pants, shorts, and women's shirts.  She is making a good income from selling these items and she wants to buy more stock with the loan. She is living in a town near the main road, so many people come to buy and she is selling every day. She opened her kiosk a year ago with working capital of $600.

loans.use: To buy more clothing to sell

loans.name: Group 9 - Tân Việt 01
