Con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: variedad de sandalias y zapatos tanto para dama como para caballero. Espera poder contar con este apoyo ya que no tiene el capital para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si tiene la capacidad de pago que el financiamiento implica.
texts.en: Adela is 66 years old. She lives with her husband and 18 year old grandson. She works selling shoes and sandals for both men and women. She works at this business with her husband and they have to travel to another town to so their selling. In order to improve her quality of life and that of her family, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying merchandise such as a variety of sandals and shoes for both men and women. She hopes to be able to have this support since she doesn't have the capital to pay for it on her own but she does have the capacity to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy a variety of sandals and shoes for men and women.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is a married woman and a mother of three young children. She is from Talibon, Bohol. Merlinda and her husband operate a tricycle business. This is to transport passengers from one place to another. This is the source of their income.
Merlinda is asking for a loan to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle. With this, they will be able to improve the good working condition of the tricycle. In the future, Merlinda hopes of making their business a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy spare parts like nuts, bolts and fuel for the tricycle.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: María, inició con su actividad de confección hace varios años, idea que surgió de la necesidad y la crisis económica por la que pasaba su familia; ya con la experiencia que había obtenido mientras trabajaba en diferentes talleres de confección, decidió emprender su propio taller, trabajando con una máquina de coser sencilla y confeccionando sobre moldes, pero cuando requería hacer recubrimientos o fileteado debía alquilar una máquina por horas o esperar a que se la prestaran. Luego de obtener una asesoría sobre el negocio para hacer de su taller un establecimiento versátil en el que confeccionara sobre medida y no sobre moldes, ella se motiva a solicitar el crédito, con el que desea comprar una máquina plana industrial para cambiar su antigua máquina y así agilizar el proceso de producción y ser más eficiente y competitiva; todo esto, debido al espíritu de superación y perseverancia que la impulsan a luchar por sus objetivos. Los ingresos que recibe por su actividad, son destinados para aportar a la economía de su familia, conformada por su esposo y 3 hijos. María sólo desea seguir fortaleciendo su negocio y hacer de él, un taller versátil que le permita prestar el servicio tanto de modistería directa como de confección a terceros, mejorando así la rentabilidad de su negocio y logrando garantizar una estabilidad financiera para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: It is some years now since María set up her dressmaking business, an idea which resulted from necessity and the economic crisis which was affecting her family.  So, using the experience she had acquired working in other clothing factories, she decided to set up her own workshop, using a simple sewing machine and patterns.  However, when she wanted to make linings or do overlocking she had to hire a machine for a number of hours or wait until someone could lend her one.  Then, when she received business guidance on how to make her workshop more versatile so that she could make clothing to measure rather than by using patterns, she was motivated to seek the loan.  She would like to use it to replace her old sewing machine with an industrial flatbed one, which will enable her to streamline the production process and make her more efficient and competitive.  All this is because of her indomitable spirit and perseverance which drive her on in pursuit of her ambitions.  Her income from her business goes to contribute to the budget of her family, which consists of her husband and 3 sons.  María's one desire is to continue strengthening her business and to make it a versatile workshop so she can offer her services to direct customers as well as third parties.  This will improve her business's profitability and guarantee the financial stability which will allow her to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy an industrial flatbed sewing machine

loans.name: Jestina

texts.en: Theresa lives in New Kru, Liberia. She is 36 years old, and married with five children between the ages of 6 to 19. All her kids are in school and live at home. For the past four years she has been operating a small shop where she sells fashion clothes. She says some time sales are slow but she earns more profit during the holiday season. She started this business by selling in the community with the little goods she could afford. She learned this way of selling from her friends. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fashion clothes for her business. Her plan is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: to purchase more fashion clothes for her business.

loans.name: Ana Yenci

texts.es: Ana de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo. Ana es una mujer emprendedora ya que busca las oportunidades del mercado para poner sus negocios. Ella se dedica a la vena de gas propano y además tiene un molino de nixtamal en el que muele variedad de semillas tales como: maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es el que le permite sacar el ingreso para ayudar en la economía del hogar. Lastimosamente su molino se le ha dañado el motor por lo que no está funcionando situación que le está causando mucha inestabilidad ya que no está percibiendo ese ingreso, solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de gas propano y un nuevo motor eléctrico para su molino y de esta forma reactivar el negocio que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Ana is 25 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and small son. Ana is an enterprising woman and looks for opportunities in the market where she can set up her businesses. She makes a living selling propane gas and also has a mill which she uses to grind a variety of grains such as corn, rice, beans etc. This business is her main source of income and is the business she can take an income from to help with the household finances.

Unfortunately the mill's motor has been damaged and so it is not working. This situation is causing Ana financial problems as she is not getting this income. She is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy propane gas and a new electric motor for her mill so she can reactivate the business which she badly needs.

loans.use: to buy an electric motor for a corn mill and propane gas.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela de 44 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos. Estela se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comales y ollas a base de barro de forma artesanal. De esta forma colabora con la economía del hogar y junto a su esposo van sacando adelante a su familia. Su vivienda es sencilla y humilde la cual desea hacer algunos arreglos como es el caso de la cubierta del techo que se encuentra deteriorado y necesita cambio. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines, lámina galvanizada, y pines. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Estela is 44 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and her four children. Estela works making and selling handmade clay comales and pots. In this way she helps with the household budget and together with her husband they get the family ahead. Her home is simple and humble and she wants to do some repairs, for example on the roof covering. It has deteriorated and needs to be changed. She is asking FUSAI for this loan in order to buy rods, galvanized sheeting and tacks. She says she is able to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy rods, galvanized sheeting, and tacks to repair the roof covering on her house.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 52 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo. Ángela se dedica a la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.) y a la elaboración y venta de variedad de artesanías.  Trabaja muy duro para mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Con el fin de mejorar su situación habitacionales desea ampliar una habitación de su vivienda, el cual es muy pequeño y las paredes se encuentran deterioradas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, grava, arena, hierro y cemento.
texts.en:
Angela is 52 years old and is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her son. Angela makes a living selling pupusas (food product made from corn, beans, cheese etc.) and making and selling handicrafts. She works very hard to improve her quality of life.

In order to improve her living conditions she wants to extend a room in her home which is very small and where the walls have deteriorated. This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, gravel, and, iron and cement.

loans.use: to buy bricks, gravel, and, iron and cement, to extend a room in her home.

loans.name: Maria Ana

texts.es: A sus 57 años de edad María trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 27 años, 24 años y 16 años de edad. María se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos todos los días se levanta muy temprano para hacer los quehaceres de su casa y luego sale a lavar y planchar ajeno. Su deseo es dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia por lo que desea reparar el techo y el piso de su vivienda,  razón por la  que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena y cemento para hacer las reparaciones lo antes posible.
texts.en: At 57 years old, María works hard to get her family ahead. She lives in her own home with her husband and three children, aged 27, 24 and 16. María works in domestic service. She gets up early every day to do the housework and the goes out to wash and iron for other people. She wants to give her family better living conditions and so wants to repair the roof and floor of her home. That is why she is asking FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, sand and cement to do the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, sand and cement to repair the roof and floor of her home.

loans.name: Fatima Del Carmen

texts.es: Fátima de 22 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, sus condiciones habitacionales son muy humildes pero poco a poco va haciendo las mejoraras necesarias. Fátima trabaja como vendedora de una tienda de su localidad y junto a su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante poco a poco. Actualmente la cocina la tiene al aire libre por lo que desea construir un cuarto para proteger sus pocas pertenencias. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la  construcción de la cocina para lo cual necesita material como: lámina galvanizada, polines, cemento y pines para sujetar la lámina.
texts.en: Fátima is 22 years old and lives in her own home along with her life partner.  Her living conditions are very humble, but little by little she has been making the necessary improvements.  Fátima works as a salesperson in a store in her town and together with her life partner they are getting ahead little by little.  Currently her kitchen is open air, and she would like to build a room in order to protect her few belongings.  She is asking for this loan from Kiva partner FUSAI in order to invest in the construction of a kitchen for which she needs material like galvanized metal sheets, poles, cement, and wood in order to hold up the metal sheets.

loans.use: To buy galvanized metal sheets, poles, cement, and wood for the building of a kitchen.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro vive solo, sus padres son del interior y  hace más de 3 años que está  viviendo en Pilar.
Comenta que vino para poder realizar sus estudios terciarios y este año los está culminando, espera conseguir un trabajo acorde con el estudio que realiza y así poder ayudar a sus padres por todo lo que le dieron hasta el día de hoy. Él está estudiando la carrera de Comercio Internacional, el cual le abrirá muchas puertas.
Pide de este crédito para poder cubrir sus cuotas de la universidad. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Pedro lives alone. His parents are from the interior of the country, but he has been living in Pilar for more than three years.

Pedro says that he has been pursuing his higher education and will be finishing this year. He hopes to get a job in his field of study so that he can help his parents in return for everything they have done for him to this day.

Pedro is studying for a degree in International Business, which will open many doors. He is requesting this loan so that he can cover his university expenses. Pedro is grateful for the opportunity he has received to continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay for his university expenses.

loans.name: Bimala

texts.en:
Bimala is 38 years old; she is married and has three children.  Many years ago, she established her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid six loans from Patan BPW, and used her most recent loan to buy grocery goods for her business.  

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, the owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

In the future, Bimala plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora de 35 años de edad es madre soltera de tres hijos de 13 años, 10 años y 7 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que trabaja duramente para darles mejores condiciones. Desde muy joven prendió el oficio de artesana y ahora en día se dedica a la elaboración de comales y ollas de forma artesanal. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar.  Con el propósito de mejorar sus condiciones desea construir el cuarto de la cocina para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI e invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y en la mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en:
Dora, 35, is a single mother of three children, ages 13, 10, and 7.  The most important thing to her is her children; she works hard so they have better living conditions.

She learned to be an artisan from a young age and now works making clay griddles ["comales"] and other pots by hand.  This business is her main source of income and it allows her to support her household.

Dora wants to build a kitchen to improve her living conditions, so she's requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She's going to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails, and pay for labor for the construction.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies and to pay for labor

loans.name: Santos Benjamin

texts.es: Santos de 54 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos de 19 años, 17 años y 15 años de edad. Santos es un hombre trabajador y responsable desde hace 5 años trabaja en una comercial cercana a su localidad, de esta forma se gana la vida y logra llevar el sustento diario.  La vivienda de Santos es muy humilde y sencilla pero tiene la ventaja de que es propia y puede ir mejorándola poco a poco. Las paredes de su vivienda son de a base de lodo las cuales se encuentran dañadas y desea repararlas lo antes posible, razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para hacer el cambio de las paredes lo antes posible.
texts.en: Santos is 54 years old. He lives in his own house with his life's companion and his children aged 19, 17 and 15. Santos is a hardworking and responsible man. For 5 years, he has worked in a business near to his home. That is how he earns a living and the daily support. Santos' house is very humble and simple but he has the advantage of it belonging to him, so he can improve on it little by little. The walls of his house are a mud base and have been damaged. He wants to repair them as soon as possible, and that is why he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to change the walls as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails to repair the walls of his house.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married woman who lives in her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and water. 

For the past three years, she has operated an agricultural sales business, selling farm produce from home to her neighbours and passersby. She dreams of expanding her business to generate more income. 

With the loan of Kes 20,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase more seedlings and pesticides. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more seedlings and pesticides.

loans.name: Kihunga Twetungure Group

texts.en: Deus is a member of Kihunga group and a father of four children aged 10,14,16 and 18. He has a retail shop in a nearby cell and his customers are mainly residents of the cell and the neighboring cells. He works on the shop every day and dedicates twelve hours to the business every day. He started the shop in 2005 and he has seen the business grow from one level to another. In addition to the retail shop, Deus also trades coffee which boosts his income. He hopes to use the loan money (one million shillings only) to buy more stock for his business so that he can have maximized profits in the Christmas season. His challenge is competition from other traders in the cell but he hopes that the challenge will be overcome if he stocks his shop, thereby giving variety items to his customers. He has high hopes that with his hard work and with the loan he is given he will expand his business to a wholesale status.

loans.use: To buy retail stock items for sell

loans.name: Levon

texts.en:
Levon is from Gyumri where he lives with his mother and brother. He has worked as a taxi driver over the last five years, using his own car. Levon's mother works at local factory, but the main income of the family comes from Levon's taxi driving activity. Currently Levon needs to renovate the car and purchase new tires for the winter. He has applied for this loan to pay for that. 

Levon has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

The loan will greatly assist Levon as the car is damaged and needs to be renovated.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the car and purchase new tires for winter

loans.name: Mayakaba

texts.en: Mayakaba lives in New Kru town; she is 48 years old, and married with four children ages 23 to 35. Her children are out of school and only one lives at home. For the past 20 years she has been selling fresh fish in the local market. She started this business by selling rice in the communities with the little goods she could afford, and learned this way of selling from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fresh fish for her business, her plans are to expand her business and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more fresh fish for her business

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es: María de 26 años de edad reside en condiciones muy sencillas junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 10 años, 6 años y 1 año de edad. Para María su familia lo es todo y es por ella que trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Desde hace 2 años logró establecer un pequeño negocio de venta de helados tales como: gelatinas, chocobananos (banano cubierto con chocolate), etc.  Es muy emprendedora y  visionaria. Desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el repello de las paredes de su vivienda y reparar el cuarto del baño el cual en la actualidad está hecho de plástico y no da seguridad y privacidad. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento y otros materiales necesarios para la mejora.
texts.en:
María is 26 and lives in a very simple home with her husband and their three children, who are ages ten, six, and one. María's family is the most important thing in her life and is the motivation for her to work hard so her husband and children can have a better life. Two years ago, María succeeded in setting up a small business selling ice cream and desserts: jello, chocolate covered bananas, and others. 

María is very resourceful and has a clear vision: she wants to improve her family's living conditions. María is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI [Fundación Salvadoreña de Apoyo Integral - Salvadoran Foundation for Comprehensive Development] to purchase plaster for the walls in her home and materials to repair the bathroom. The bathroom is made of plastic and doesn't offer either privacy or security. María will use funds from this loan to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, sand, cement, and other materials for these improvements.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, sand, cement, and other materials for home repair.

loans.name: Yosselin Del Carmen

texts.es: Yosselin de  23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su  esposo y sus hijos de 6 años y 4 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy humilde y sencilla que con mucho esfuerzo junto a su esposo han logrado llevar la economía del hogar.  Con el deseo de mejorar y asegurar sus pocas pertenencias desea terminar de construir el cuarto de la cocina ya que por el momento la tiene al aire libre y no es muy seguro. Ha solicitado a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizad, madera y clavos y así terminar de construir el cuarto lo antes posible.
texts.en: Yosselin, who is 23, lives with her husband and 2 children, aged 4 and 6, in their own home.  She is a very humble and modest woman who, along with her husband, has worked hard to manage the household budget.  She would like to improve and secure her few possessions and so she wants to finish the construction of a kitchen, her current one being in the open air and not very secure.  She has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanised sheeting, wood and nails so that she can get the kitchen built as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy galvanised sheeting, wood and nails for the construction of a kitchen
